item.description:
Creating Your Own Vision Board



The Secret explains with simplicity the law that is governing all lives, and offers the knowledge of how to create a joyful life. This is the secret to everything - the secret to unlimited happiness, love, health and prosperity. This is the secret to life. After viewing "The Secret", you are invited to create a new reality. This begins with visualizing what your ideal life looks like. This session will begin with a short discussion on the Causal Sequence of Life:

BE FEEL THINK DO HAVE.

Basic art supplies will be provided. Feel free to bring anything that will
personalize your Vision Board such as pictures and decorations.

We will see you for a great meal, great conversation and a great community!
item.name: Paths to Light June Meetup
